entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
